review:
Very confident with her diagnosis and treatment plan. 
Explained the treatment very well 
Highly recommended
Consultation fees Rs. 300, x-ray charge Rs. 150 and crown fixing charge Rs. 500 charged separately. Crown fixing charges are too high.
reply_text:
Please check with the consultation and fixation charges of other clinics in case of any discrepancy 
The charges were lesser than normally charged 
Regards

tags: Value for money,
review: Too costly...not recommended ... Doctor charges was too high, unnecessary demand high cost...,.....,.....,.
reply_text:
Scaling charges ranges upon the amount of deposit
Incase of extreme deposits the charges of any clinic ranges from 1800-3000
However only 1800 was charges as extraction had to be done
More over the charges of extraction was taken only to be 500 , where as the rate of any clinic starts from 800
The charges were explained before commencing the treatment and approval was taken for the same
Please enquire other clinic charges on case of any discrepancy
